name: Proc-gen dungeon prototype
description:
This a little procedural generated dungeon, with grid-based controls. Not a game tho, nothing can hurt you, you just explore it...

Controls:

  • w/s : move forward/backward
  • a/d: strafe left/strafe right
  • q/e: turn left/turn right
  • r: run
  • space: action (open door, attack...)

Credits:

  • Made with unity
  • Code by myself (sprvrn)
  • 3D models from the procjam2017 art pack (made by Devil's Garage) released under Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported (CC BY-NC 3.0)
  • Font by Daniel Linssen: m5x7 and m3x6.
